snippet: A suburban Minneapolis man who who had a long-running dispute with two neighbors over feeding deer opened fire on them, killing one person, according to criminal charges.
abstract: Police say Neal Curtis Zumberge of New Brighton, Minn, who had a long-running dispute with two neighbors over feeding deer, opens fire on them, killing one of them; shootings occur hours after Zumberge's son was arrested on suspicion of threatening to burn down couple's house.
lead_paragraph: A suburban Minneapolis man who who had a long-running dispute with two neighbors over feeding deer opened fire on them, killing one person, according to criminal charges.

headline.main: Minnesota: Dispute Over Deer Feeding Is Said to Lead to Fatal Shooting
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Dispute Over Deer Feeding Is Said to Lead to a Fatal Shooting
